ride1.name: Log Ride
ride1.description: A log ride through the herbivore enclosure. Kid's stuff.

ride2.name: Mayan Mind Bender
ride2.description: A roller coaster enclosed in a fake temple. Definitely anachronistic but who cares. Dark coasters are hip. It's the 90's so technically not racist?

ride3.name: Whirly Pterodactyl
ride3.description: Dangerous and nauseating. Only for people who have no inner ears.

ride4.name: Pirates of the Pancreas
ride4.description: Not our IP but inspired by our IP so we're gonna take credit for it. Very unsettling. 18+ ONLY.
